title: Haunted House Cleaners
description: If you sense spirits in your home, there’s one man to call. He’s Carrigan Burke and he’s here to clean house.
quote: Is this labyrinthine network of sewers playing host… to a malevolent spirit?
altHero: night vision shot of Carrigan Burke
alt2: Burke peeking up from below a shelf
alt3: Burke in an old sewer tunnel
